Generation VII.Sun: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.
Generation VII.Moon: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

Generation VII.Sun: Route 17 or Malie Garden ( Only four for either location)

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one , requires unlocking the They Came From The Ultra Beyond! adventure)
